page.title: 19Family life -D.Stapleton
page.content: My Mum is usually up first during the week, but not on Saturdays or Sundays. When she gets up she goes into the bathroom, has her wash and gets dressed.Then she goes downstairs and on Sundays starts to get the Sunday dinner ready.While it is cooking she gets out the hoover (vacuum cleaner) and starts hoovering the carpets.When she has done that she gets the polish and duster out and starts to polish the furniture.When she has done that she goes to feed the fish in the fish tank. She feeds the fish on fish food called "Aquarium".Then she sits down and watches the television. When her programme has finished she goes and turns off the dinner and she starts to dish it out. She then goes into the front room and eats it with us. When she has eaten her Sunday dinner she goes into the kitchen and washes up.
